text.section: Unless the context requires otherwise, in this title the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Applicant" means a person or governmental unit that applies for a development permit.
"Development permit" means a permit for a development project.
"Development project" means a proposed construction or development for which more than 1 permit is required.

"Governmental unit" includes:
the State;
a county, municipal corporation, or other political subdivision of the State; and
a unit of a political subdivision of the State.

"Local government" means:
a county;
a municipal corporation in the State; or
a unit of a county or municipal corporation in the State.

section.section: "Permit" means a certificate, license, or other document of approval or permission required to be obtained from a local government or a State unit.

"Permit" does not include:
an action on a comprehensive zoning application;
an action on an application for a zoning map amendment, zoning special exception, zoning variance, or conditional zoning use; or
an occupational license or operating permit.
"State unit" means a unit of the State government.

Except as provided in paragraph (3) of this subsection, "State unit" includes:
a unit in a principal department of the Executive Branch of the State government; and
the governing body of a single county or multicounty district or authority.

"State unit" does not include:
the Board of Review of a principal department;
the governing body of a local government; or
a unit that a local government creates.
